name: The Tap Color Game
description:
Warning : extremely difficult game !
Keep the rythm going in this reflex game.
4 directions/ 4 colors.
Tap on the screen to rotate the circle in the four possible directions, and line up your color with the one on the propelled balls.
Hold on as long as you can during this infinite wave !

Could you last longer than anyone else ?

SupremApp Studio
